a.title: Information about the Conservatory Lab Foundation

li.a: Information about the Conservatory Lab Foundation

a.h1: Conservatory Lab Charter School Announces School Closure

div.small: In accordance with the Governor’s guidelines, Conservatory Lab Charter School is closed until Monday, May 4th. Click the link at the top left for resources regarding COVID 19 and Online Learning.
Full concert playlist available on YouTube.
Support Our Annual Fund through the Conservatory Lab Foundation

div.p: The lottery for the 2020-2021 school year was held on March 10th, 2020 and the results are now in. If you would like to know your child's lottery status you can email admissions@conservatorylab.org or nramsey@conservatorylab.org.
We will also send out letters to families to inform you of your child's waitlist status as well.
Review the full updates regarding our ongoing efforts to prepare for and prevent exposure to COVID-19, and access resources for families

div.h1: African American Art and Collage at Conservatory Lab
div.p: To celebrate Black History Month, Conservatory Lab is featuring African American scholars, artists, and leaders that will inspire our students. … Read more »

Donate to the Annual fund through the Conservatory Lab Foundation - Conservatory Lab students are the heart of our community, we nurture them to be dedicated performers and scholars, please join us and empower our students to thrive this year and in the future!

a.div: Information for families and students regarding learning and other resources.

div.p: Since opening its doors in 1999, Conservatory Lab Charter School has always believed in El Sistema and the power of music to transform children’s lives.
At Conservatory Lab, EL Education invigorates instructional practices by supporting a standards-based curriculum that is both rigorous and joyful
Find out how our students are succeeding in and beyond our classrooms!
Conservatory Lab held its Winter Showcase on January 11, 2020, at the historic Strand Theatre in Upham’s Corner. It is… Read more »

p.br: We depend on a strong community of donors, volunteers, and artists to make our school sing. Click the button to become a part of the music!

div.p:
As a Donor.
As a Volunteer.
As a Teacher or Resident Artist.

div.div: Want to keep up-to-date on all the latest news and upcoming events at our school? Click here to subscribe to our email newsletter! Receive information on concerts, board meetings, what’s happening in the classroom, special collaborations, and more!
